output_list.reason: The function transfer has no checks to prevent malicious users from transferring tokens to other addresses.
The function mintlvlToken does not have any checks to prevent users from minting more tokens than the maximum supply.
The function freezelvlAccount does not have any checks to prevent users from freezing an account without permission.
The function setlvlSign does not have any checks to prevent users from changing the sign without permission.
The function setlvlNominalValue does not have any checks to prevent users from changing the nominal value without permission.
